TopicTitle: What patch is the best to mod right now?

Articles.Content: Hey everyone, i started modding ksp recently and wondered what is the best patch to mod it right now? i want as many different good mods as possible and features of the game, thanks for help!

What do you mean by Patch?  Ksp version?

Most mods are usually up to date within a couple months of a new version release. 

But... some more complex mods are 'stuck' in older versions, and those are rabbit holes you can fall deep into. 

Without knowing what you want to do with your game, there is no good answer to this question.  As a guess, I'd say a lot of players use 30-50 mods at any one time, but everybody uses different mod loadouts to suit their play style.   

There is no "best" mod load out for KSP.  There is only the best mod load out for you.

I was using 1.3.1 for ages but I've moved over to 1.4.3 now. I do get a few warnings when I first load up, as some of the mods I'm using were compiled for 1.4.1 and 1.4.2 but everything seems to be working fine!
